dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3824524F] Link not authorize
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

May I know who has authorize this link with mine please? 
 
Please see file attach plus it is wrtitten only in ARABIC version which
can  
not be translate! 
as you translation section does not work!.As you see below I have all
info  
on your company and 
the server.Therefore before putting a complaint for spamming, I would
like  
an explanation from 
the owner of golfmastergames first as my site is copyright protect by
the  
U.S. office and why 
every section is in Arabic and can not be translate! Specially with a  
company locate in Quicy, 
Massachusetts.U.S.A 
 
Thank you 
 
M.Petrucci 
Ower of www.golfslicenhooknomore.com
